We established the [Avondale] school for the purpose of making most diligent efforts to reach the higher education, of which Christ spoke in His 


                                    -156- 

prayer to His Father. "And this is life eternal," He said, "that they might know Thee the only true God, and Jesus Christ, whom thou hast sent." (John 17:3.)--Letter 12, 1898, p. 9. (To Brother Hare, January 21, 1898.)
